17}}</ref>{{rp: Root]] N-B-R,<ref name="PE17" /> which was mistyped as [[Sundocarmë
TI}}, p. 174</ref> in [[The Treason of Isengard]].<ref>[http://www.forodrim.org/daeron/md_khuzdul.html An analysis of Dwarvish] by [[Magnus Åberg]]</ref>

'''''inbar''''' "a horn"<ref name="PE17": Magnus Åberg speculated that the actual word might be *''nibar'' or *''mibar'' since words of three radical vowels such this don't begin with a vowel, but the form given in [[Parma Eldalamberon 17
17}}</ref>{{rp: PE17]] is merely ''inbar''.<ref name="PE17" /> The currently-unpublished notes on Khuzdul phonology and root modifications may shed light on this matter.<ref>{{webcite
